mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOODS_TABLE ( GDS_NAME, GDS_CATEGORY_CODE, GDS_PRICE, GDS_STOCK, GDS_DESC, GDS_IMG, GDS_DATE ) VALUES ( #{GDS_NAME}, #{GDS_CATEGORY_CODE}, #{GDS_PRICE}, #{GDS_STOCK}, #{GDS_DESC}, #{GDS_IMG}, NOW() )
mapper.select:
SELECT A.GDS_NUM, A.GDS_NAME, FORMAT(A.GDS_PRICE, 0) AS GDS_PRICE, B.CATEGORY_NAME AS GDS_CATEGORY_NAME, B.CATEGORY_REF, A.GDS_CATEGORY_CODE, FORMAT(A.GDS_STOCK, 0) AS GDS_STOCK, A.GDS_DESC, A.GDS_IMG, DATE_FORMAT(A.GDS_DATE, "%Y %c/%e %r") AS GDS_DATE FROM GOODS_TABLE AS A INNER JOIN GOODS_CATEGORY_TABLE AS B ON A.GDS_CATEGORY_CODE = B.CATEGORY_CODE
WHERE A.GDS_NUM = #{gds_num}
SELECT CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_CODE, CATEGORY_REF, CATEGORY_LEVEL FROM GOODS_CATEGORY_TABLE
